keyFacts: The account balance for Jeffrey Epstein as of December 31, 2013, was $2,146,215.33.
A significant deposit of $2,000,000.00 was made on December 20, 2013.
Multiple outgoing transfers were made to various accounts, including those of Larry Visoski and Martin Weinberg.
The document contains numerous transactions, including checks and electronic transfers, indicating active account management.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.
